title: Minh Long - Showroom Quận 3
address: 17 Bà Huyện Thanh Quan, Phường Võ Thị Sáu, Quận 3, Hồ Chí Minh 700000

reviews.name: Paulina Kosmowska-Monroy
reviews.review:
An absolute pleasure to shop there. Amazing quality table ware; we bought about 16 kg of bowls, plates, tea sets, and various dishes, which is already sitting nicely in our kitchen cabinets, per attached photos. Service was incredible. Extremely helpful and honest staff; we received lots of suggestions, and were informed when, for example, certain dishes would not be microwave or dishwasher safe. All items were packed in such way that they survived two plane trips, one 12.5h and one 2h, undelicate handling by airport staff, and the taxi drivers. Not a single item was broken.

Prices are a bit high, but the products are really worth it. In the UK we would likely have paid four or five times the price for these products. We paid about GBP 130 for a tea set with six cups and saucers, seven-item set of tableware consisting of plates, soup bowls, spoons, with a matching set of tea/coffee pot, with seven cups and saucers, sugar and cream bowls, two big oval plates for serving food, a matching soup tureen, and another bigger soup tureen.

I attached photos of some (but not all) items, mainly due to laziness to take the tureens out of cupboards :-)

reviews.name: Jimmy Nguyen
reviews.review: Dung/Julie is the best seller in Minh Long Showroom Q3. She knows all the materials and information you could possibly need or want. There was no question she couldn’t answer and even ordered items for us from other stores so we can see samples. I would highly recommend finding her if you come her and have her show you around. Summer  July/2024

reviews.name: Huỳnh Tấn Đức
reviews.review: Awesome Vietnam Traditional Ceramics. Love it so much 💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖 …

reviews.name: Tung Mai
reviews.review: It's simply the best place to get high quality Vietnamese ceramics. Service is quite good. Significantly, Minh Long's ceramics are outstanding in term of quality. However, Minh Long need to try harder to improve their design to give customers more options to choose. I've used Minh Long's products for years and got no complaint up to now.

reviews.name: Vo Quynh Huong
reviews.review: Can find all Minh Long pottery ceramic here. Good design but a little bit narrow aisle. Wholesale, retail also. Free parking if buying items.

reviews.name: Sudha Rawat
reviews.review: It's a delightful place which has something for everyone! It is not a tourist trap and has well priced authentic ceramics. The staff is polite and packing is good. Must visit!

reviews.name: Suong Huynh
reviews.review: Prime location, easy to find, selling many quality ceramic products at reasonable prices. Many beautiful flower vase products, reputable addresses to buy gifts. Cute and dedicated sales staff.

reviews.name: Hiền Nguyễn

reviews.name: Thức Nguyễn

reviews.name: Pham Ngoc Huy
reviews.review: Enthusiastic and polite service, beautiful and elegant products.

reviews.name: Tuan Henric
reviews.review: Minh Long ceramic showroom displays and sells products such as tea sets, dishes, jam trays, diverse classic and modern styles, at reasonable prices from affordable to high-end. There are also artistic ceramics such as flower vases, images of girls wearing ao dai, ceramic models of the bride and groom or mascots. Polite staff, enthusiastic advice, careful inspection and packaging.

reviews.name: thanh huong
reviews.review: Cool and luxurious space. Beautiful products, eye-catching displays, cute and enthusiastic staff will support...

reviews.name: Phương Trịnh
reviews.review: Professional customer service. Enthusiastic consultants, knowledgeable about products and ready to answer all customer questions

reviews.name: Pierre Relave
reviews.review:
Lousy!

I have been a customer of Minh Long for more than five years. So far everything had gone pretty well. I must have spent around 50 million VND with them. I am not a major customer but I am a regular customer.
I recently placed an order for my restaurant for around 10 million VND. Then I realized that I was missing some items so I contacted the sales representative. In his response he clarified that I would have to pay the delivery costs because this last order is less than 5 million VND (the cost of delivery between district 3 and district 1 is a maximum of 50,000 VND, i.e. 2 euros). I asked the salesman if he was joking and he told me no.
A few days later, I stopped by the store and asked to see the manager to talk about this. When I told her I thought it was pathetic to charge a regular customer like me for shipping, she just looked at me and laughed in my face and said it was company policy.
So this is how we treat customers at Minh Long. You saved 50,000 VND and made fun of me. You won't see me anymore.

The staff also helped to pack things properly. There is even a gift for invoices over 2 million VND. Can be recommended.

reviews.name: Hữu Nhân Nguyễn
reviews.review:
The customer called to ask about the product and it said it was out of stock and I asked to check with another store to see if they had it so I could go buy it, but it said "Please call me back in 5 minutes". Ok, I tried to call back automatically after 5 minutes, but I called 5 times and no one picked up @@
Around 6:45 p.m. today, November 30, 2023.

reviews.review:
Brother m !!

reviews.name: Quan Do
reviews.review: The pattern is beautiful but it breaks easily. I bought a large bowl to use for a few days but poured boiling soup into the bowl and it cracked. Ox dropped the beef bone onto the plate and broke it in half. It's really disappointing that the quality doesn't match the price

reviews.name: su van
reviews.review:
High quality products are different.

reviews.name: Hoang Van Hai
reviews.review: The service staff is very cheerful and enthusiastic, beautiful products, very satisfied...!

reviews.name: Phạm văn Giáp
reviews.review: The largest ceramic company in the South. Ordered from December 30, 2022 to January 7, 2023, misleading customer response. Finally not sent yet. I also sell several hundred orders every day. However, Minh Long staff said that the shipping orders were overloaded.  Satisfied... the order was delivered and the mid-range price was 2 sets of 5 million but the service staff was too poor

reviews.name: Thao Phan Van
reviews.review: I just made a purchase about a week ago. The store is large and airy. Enthusiastic and professional consulting staff.  Quality products, reasonable prices

reviews.name: Vũ Hồ
reviews.review: Friendly staff. Beautiful, quality product.

reviews.name: TUYET ANH MAI THI
reviews.review: I bought a baby bottle and carp, the red and yellow colors are quite cute, suitable for spring. Minh Long porcelain has a variety of designs, and there is a new product, a portable cup holder. A breakthrough in ML ceramics.

reviews.name: Tuan Hoang
reviews.review: The store is located on Ba Huyen Thanh Quan Street, District 3. Underground parking. The product display store is located on the ground floor. Products mainly serve family needs: dinnerware sets, tea sets, a few decorative products... Diverse products for popular, medium and high-end categories. Products are available for sale on site. Safe and quality packaging. You can pay by cash or card. Staff are attentive, polite, and professional.

reviews.name: Khương Trần
reviews.review: Great

reviews.name: Lộc Nguyễn
reviews.review: Beautiful products, carefully packaged, enthusiastic staff. So proud of Vietnamese products.

reviews.name: Hằng Mã
reviews.review: Phuong Dung's advice is enthusiastic and cute, and she continues to support Ming Long.

reviews.name: Huu Phuoc
reviews.review: The gift is a company product that doesn't exist, so giving other gifts is not practical. Because practical gifts are no longer available. I'd rather not have it than give it away. I don't take gifts and bring them home without using them. I bought the product but I feel uncomfortable about the after-sales part.

reviews.name: Hòa Ngô
reviews.review: The goods here are very diverse and have clearly listed prices... Professional and enthusiastic staff support customers... This is a shopping destination to visit when you want to buy high-end crockery..

reviews.name: Ngô Trung Dũng
reviews.review: A wonderful space, an ideal place to buy high quality civil ceramics, diverse designs, rich designs and high aesthetics; In addition, the fine art porcelain is also very impressive.

reviews.name: Ha Hoang
reviews.review: July 28, 2019: The products are good, beautiful and diverse, but the staff lacks warmth and professionalism, and the service style is a bit government-style.
